title: Smart Data Models- Industrial robot arm schema
description: A robotic arm for moving stone pieces.

type.description: Property. It has to be RobotArm. NGSI Entity type.

serialNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The robot identifier, makes it unique in the world.

proState0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Status of the Robot PLC

proState1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Status of the Robot Program Interpreter

drivesOn.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Status of the Robot Drives

drivesOff.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Status of signal to turn the Robot Drives to off

peripheryReady.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Readiness of all peripheral devices around the robot

emergencyStop.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Readiness of the emergency circuit of the robot

operatingMode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. State of the turn key switch on top of the robot control panel

positionX.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual x coordinate of the robot position (with the actual tool and base coordinates)

positionY.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual y coordinate of the robot position (with the actual tool and base coordinates)

positionZ.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual z coordinate of the robot position (with the actual tool and base coordinates)

positionA.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual a (rotation around z axis) coordinate of the robot position (with the actual tool and base coordinates)

positionB.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual b (rotation around y axis) coordinate of the robot position (with the actual tool and base coordinates)

positionC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual c (rotation around x axis) coordinate of the robot position (with the actual tool and base coordinates)

toolX.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual x value for the definition of the tool frame.

toolY.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual y value for the definition of the tool frame.

toolZ.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual z value for the definition of the tool frame.

toolA.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual a value for the definition of the tool frame.

toolB.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual b value for the definition of the tool frame.

toolC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual c value for the definition of the tool frame.

baseX.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual x value for the definition of the base frame.

baseY.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual y value for the definition of the base frame.

baseZ.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual z value for the definition of the base frame.

baseA.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual a value for the definition of the base frame.

baseB.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual b value for the definition of the base frame.

baseC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Actual c value for the definition of the base frame.

angleAxis2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Angle of the second axis on the robot arm.
